_source.text: 15 current coaches I think are better than Mike Brown off the top of my head, not counting available guys like SVG, Mark Jackson, George Karl, or any of the college guys.

text: 15 current coaches I think are **better** **than** Mike Brown off the top of my head, not counting
available guys like SVG, **Mark** **Jackson**, George Karl, or any of the college guys.

_source.text: 57.6, worse than Tarvaris Jackson, Rex Grossman and Kyle Orton, and only slightly better than the gold standard of shitty, inaccurate quarterbacks, Mark Sanchez.

text: 57.6, worse than Tarvaris **Jackson**, Rex Grossman and Kyle Orton, and only slightly **better** **than** the
gold standard of shitty, inaccurate quarterbacks, **Mark** Sanchez.
